description: Patrol officers participate in trail safety initiatives
maintext: Southern Georgina Bay OPP will be out on the snow mobile trails this weekend to make sure drivers obey Ontario Federation of Snowmobile Clubs rules. Special attention being paid to aggressive drivers not obeying OFSC trail rules and impaired drivers. There will be R.I.D.E. checks to help keep area snowmobile trails safe for all skill levels.
title: OPP Patrol Snow Mobile Trails This Weekend
